description: This file is a CMake script designed to find and set up the Nexus library for a project, including locating necessary files, defining imported targets, and setting properties based on available files and conditions.

methods.name: find_path
methods.description: Searches for a header file within specified directories.

methods.name: find_library
methods.description: Searches for a specified library file.

methods.name: find_package_handle_standard_args
methods.description: Handles standard arguments for locating a package.

methods.name: add_library
methods.description: Defines a new library target, possibly imported.
